text: is a former Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Takabayashi was born on November 15, 1953. After graduating from Chuo University, he joined Japan Soccer League club Hitachi in 1976. The club won 1976 JSL Cup. He retired in 1982. He played 79 games and scored 10 goals in the league. On February 12, 1974, when Takabayashi was a Chuo University student, he debuted and scored a goal for the Japan national team against Singapore. In September, he was selected Japan for 1974 Asian Games. He also played at 1976 Summer Olympics qualification.
